name: Merrows
overview:
Merrows is a retail company which started in 2003 and is still trading activitely. The company sells in the retail, trade, contract markets via a retail premises, the Web, and via commercial contacts.

The company focus is on up market bathroom goods, such as designer baths, walkin enclosures, quality brassware, minimalist sanitaryware, pumps, and other bathroom goods.

The demand for customer recommendations is so high, that Merrows started a recommendation based website called fullbe.com which takes feeds from twitter and has product recommendations. Currently as of January 2010 there are 40,000 published recommendations.

Merrows hopes to make fullbe.com a focus of recommendations on the Web and linked closely to social networking websites and retailers.
